channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Climate Tech’ is a meaningless buzzword. Let’s do this instead
item.description: “Climate tech” isn’t a thing. It has shifted in recent years from a category to define clean energy companies to an umbrella phrase that loses meaning...

item.title: 3 Clues That Will Instantly Give Away Someone With Bad Leadership Traits
item.description: These signs defeat the purpose of calling someone a ‘leader.’

item.title: Walmart’s CEO Just Gave a Sobering Prediction About AI. The Time to Prepare Is Now
item.description: The world’s largest employer expects AI to touch every single job. The only question is how to prepare.

item.title: Tactics used in the Michigan church attack resemble a new ‘hybrid threat’ meant to maximize damage, security expert says
item.description: "That all creates chaos. It could create what we call a fatal funnel trying to drive people towards one location."

item.title: How YouTube went from money pit to money printer

item.title: How China Plans to Cut 10 Percent of its Emissions by 2035
item.description: At the United Nations’ high-level climate summit, the world’s largest carbon-polluting nation, announced new plan to cut emissions.

item.title: David Marriott reveals the correct way to pronounce the popular hotel chain—and you’ve probably been doing it wrong
item.description: The Marriott empire traces back to 1927, when David's grandfather, J. Willard Marriott, opened a nine-stool A&W root beer stand in Washington, D.C.

item.title: Exclusive: REI’s CEO Shares the Retailing Co-Op’s Growth Strategy
item.description: Inside former Nike and Athleta executive Mary Beth Laughton’s plan to reverse losses at the legacy outdoor brand.

item.title: New England’s busiest train station gets a stunning, modern upgrade

item.title: This is the hidden risk in automation that leaders can’t ignore
item.description: With more than 30 years in digital transformation, I’ve seen technology cycles come and go. And the latest wave I’m seeing is AI-powered automation . ...

item.title: Investors are betting big on ‘prediction markets’ Kalshi and Polymarket—will the gamble pay off?
item.description: The two startups generated huge buzz by accurately predicting the 2024 election results. Their young founders still face long odds.

item.title: 5G Hasn’t Yet Hit Its Stride, But 6G Is Already on the Horizon
item.description: The companies that power telecom providers are already laying the groundwork for 6G communications.

item.title: Gunman in truck smashes into Michigan church and opens fire, killing at least 4 and injuring 8
item.description: The FBI is leading the investigation and considered it an “act of targeted violence,” said Ruben Coleman, a special agent in charge for the bureau.
